property_title: Modern 1-Bedroom Duplex Apartment in Faro with Private Terrace and Parking
property_description:
Modern 1-Bedroom Duplex Apartment in Faro with Private Terrace and Parking

This 1-bedroom apartment, located on the first floor, offers a unique opportunity for those seeking comfort and functionality, with the added benefit of being convertible into a 4-bedroom property. Designed with a generous open-plan layout, it seamlessly integrates the living room and kitchen into a harmonious, air-conditioned space that feels both cosy and modern.

The kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, backed by an initial two-year warranty, extendable to five years, ensuring quality and durability. High-end finishes include false ceilings with recessed lighting and multicolour LED mouldings, adding a contemporary and stylish touch. The apartment is also pre-wired for home automation, enhancing convenience, and features tilt-and-turn double-glazed windows and electric shutters for thermal comfort and efficiency.

The en-suite master bedroom is air-conditioned and includes a spacious closet, offering excellent storage. Recently renovated, the property has undergone significant upgrades to its electrical and plumbing systems. Additional features include a laundry area with a water heater and access to a private terrace with an extra bathroom, perfect for leisure and privacy.

Energy efficiency is ensured by solar panels, which not only reduce energy costs but also generate income from surplus energy sales. The apartment also provides private parking, adding convenience and security to your daily routine.

Situated just 2.5 km from Fórum Algarve and 10 minutes from Faro Airport, this property enjoys a prime location with easy access to all essential amenities and city services.

With its modern design, energy efficiency, and strategic location, this apartment is the perfect choice for a personal residence or investment. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and discover this unique property.

property_title: Traditional 4 bed Villa, Querença , Tôr e Benafim, Loulé
property_description:
This charming and traditional villa in Benafim is for sale, situated on a 799 m² plot with a house occupying 156 m², offering stunning mountain views. The villa includes 4 bedrooms and is perfect for those seeking a peaceful lifestyle while being close to essential services. It is a 20-minute drive from the town of Loulé and 30 minutes from the coast and beaches.

Located in the heart of Benafim, the villa benefits from unobstructed mountain views. Its central location allows for easy access to local shops and services, making walking trips convenient. Additionally, the villa is adjacent to one of the marked trails of the famous 'Via Algarviana', which attracts numerous tourists to the Algarve year-round.

Access to the villa is via a paved road, just 2 minutes from the main road connecting to Loulé and Alte.

This property boasts traditional architecture and solid construction quality. The ground floor features an entrance hall, a kitchen with a pantry, a combined living and dining room with a wood-burning stove, a bathroom with a toilet, shower, and sink, and four bedrooms. The exterior includes a garden with fruit trees and space for a potential swimming pool.

There is also a small annex with a wood-burning stove that can be converted into a laundry room or an independent bedroom. The outdoor area provides parking for 2-3 cars. At the top of the house, a large balcony offers a perfect spot to enjoy sunrises and sunsets with magnificent views.

Recent renovations include a brand-new traditional floor and a fresh coat of paint throughout. This property holds immense potential, with its tranquil location and stunning views being major highlights.

One of the highlights of this luxury apartment is the expansive balcony, which offers stunning panoramic sea views. It’s the perfect spot for relaxing outdoors, enjoying al fresco dining, or simply soaking in the beautiful surroundings and the region’s pleasant climate.
Residents also benefit from exclusive amenities, including a rooftop pool with sun loungers, a beautifully maintained garden, and secure boxed parking.

It is an ideal choice for those seeking an elegant and exclusive home in this beautiful city. Don't miss the chance to visit and explore all the wonders this apartment has to offer.

property_title: Stylish  Fully Renovated 3 bedroom  Two-Unit Townhouse in the Heart of Guia – Albufeira
property_description:
This beautifully renovated two-storey semi-detached townhouse is located in the heart of the picturesque village of Guia, in the municipality of Albufeira. Set on a 75 m² plot with a private gross area of 110.75 m², the property has undergone a complete transformation by a highly regarded interior architect, who created a modern and elegant home while maximising space and natural light. Just a short 10-minute drive from the stunning beaches of Albufeira, such as Praia dos Salgados and Praia da Galé, and only five minutes from the Algarve Shopping Centre, which offers a variety of shops, restaurants, cinemas, and supermarkets, the property is ideally situated for both permanent living and holiday rental potential.

Guia is famously known as the birthplace of Portugals iconic Frango Piri-Piri, or spicy grilled chicken, and is home to numerous traditional restaurants that draw visitors from across the Algarve and beyond. This unbeatable location adds strong rental appeal for investors and an authentic lifestyle for residents.

The property is currently divided into two fully independent apartments, each with a private entrance. The main apartment features an open-plan kitchen that is fully fitted with modern appliances and seamlessly connects with a bright and stylish living and dining area. On the ground floor, there is a spacious ensuite bedroom, while the first floor is dedicated to the master suite, which offers direct access to a large private balcony with excellent sun exposure, equipped with outdoor furniture perfect for relaxing. From the living area, there is also access to a beautifully designed interior patio, ideal for al fresco dining, with a barbecue area, sofas, and a dining table. This unit is fully air-conditioned with new, high-efficiency units and benefits from solar panel water heating, ensuring energy efficiency and lower operating costs. The home is equipped with high-end double-glazed windows and electric shutters for optimal insulation and comfort.

The second apartment, also fully renovated and modern, includes an open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area that opens onto its own private patio, also designed for outdoor dining and lounging, complete with a barbecue setup. A bathroom is located on the ground floor, while an elegant staircase leads to the large upstairs ensuite bedroom, which is flooded with natural light and features a built-in wardrobe and a modern bathroom with a bathtub. This unit offers the same attention to detail, including quality finishes, electric shutters, double-glazed windows, and tasteful décor.

The property also offers private parking with the possibility of installing an electric vehicle charging station, further enhancing its appeal for sustainable living. While currently divided into two independent units, the house can easily be converted back into a single-family home if desired, offering flexibility depending on your lifestyle or investment goals. Whether you're looking for a stylish and energy-efficient home in an authentic Algarvian village or seeking an attractive rental income opportunity, this property represents an outstanding choice.

Don't miss this rare chance to own a turnkey home with unique character and modern comfort in one of the Algarve's most desirable and well-connected locations. Contact Ideal Homes Portugal today to schedule your visit.

property_title: 4 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Castro Marim
property_description:
Spacious four bedroom villa for sale in Castro Marim, situated on the far Eastern Algarve this property is located close to the Spanish border. It is also just under an hour away from two international airports, Seville and Faro, making it an ideal holiday home or rental investment. With three nine-hole golf courses on site, beautiful beaches and tranquil natural surroundings nearby, you will be able to travel easily whenever you feel in need of a break away and some well deserved rest and relaxation.

Cleverly designed to comfortably accommodate more than one group of friends or family, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and is situated on the top floor. Providing access to its own small private terrace, here you can find a semblance of peace and touch of privacy from the rest of the property when desired.

On the ground floor you will find the second bedroom along with the shared bathroom, fully fitted kitchen, living area and separate WC. Outside is a patio area where you can enjoy the beautiful Algarvian sunshine.

All fittings and furnishings are to the highest standard with granite work surfaces and quality kitchen appliances. Designed for use all year round, the property is fitted with air-conditioning units that keep it cool in summer and can be switched to warm air in winter with the added benefit of an open fire to make it even cosier.

The resort offers a clubhouse and restaurant and prides itself on taking a low density approach to development meaning that all properties benefit from lovely open views. The Villages House area within the resort includes a large, shared communal pool with a tropical pool bar with terrace.

The Eastern Algarve is quieter than the Central Algarve and this property is less than twenty minutes drive from stunning beaches that although sometimes busy in peak season are relatively peaceful at other times of the year. One of the highlights is Praia Verde or “Green Beach”, so named because it is surrounded by a forest of green pine trees.

The small town of Castro Marim is less than ten minutes away and boasts a number of historic attractions including the Moorish castle, Castelo de Castro Marim and beautiful church, Igreja Matriz Castro Marim, as well as all of the amenities that you need. Other attractions include walking and bird watching in the nearby Sapal nature reserve, tennis, horse riding, sailing, windsurfing and nipping over to Spain for some lunchtime tapas!

property_title: Elegant two-storey villa Pestana Silves Golf Resort Lote 61 Quartershares
property_description:
Elegant two-storey villa with private pool, part of an exclusive set of only six villas, belonging to the tourist resort Pestana Silves Golf Resort. Lote 61
On the main floor we have the living room with fully equipped kitchen in open plan with a practical breakfast bar. These two divisions have access to the outdoor leisure area and private pool.


This floor also has a bedroom with built-in wardrobe and access to the terrace and garden. There is also a second room with built-in wardrobe that can be used as an office or TV room. This floor has a full bathroom with shower.


On the upper floor we have the master bedroom with a dressing room and bathroom with shower and bath, access to a large balcony. We also found another versatile room with access to a balcony. All the rooms of this comfortable property have access to the outside through large windows.

Pestana Silves Golf Resort consists of an 18-hole golf course, club house with restaurant, bar, golf shop and paddle court.
When you buy a property in one of the Pestana Group Resorts in the Algarve, we guarantee a maintenance service, gardening and security 24 hours of excellence.


We also offer the Pestana Resort Card to enjoy discounts in our restaurants and bars together with the Pestana Guest Card (PGC) loyalty program with numerous advantages on stays at hotels of the Group.

The dream of owning a beautiful holiday home in the Algarve, with its warm climate,the unique and superb beaches and golf courses, involves a major financial investment and is sometimes difficult to justify if the property is only used occasionally.

We offer an Alternative: The Four Owner Plan

For a relatively small investment you become part owner of a freehold property which is yours to enjoy throughout the year on a rotating basis. You will become an owner together with 3 other independent owners of a modern linked villa with swimming pool in the Pestana Silves Golf, and every 1/4 of the property will be secured by individual title deeds.

Purchasing through this well proven system considerably reduces the cost of ownership as it is split into four equal parts, and each owner uses the property for thirteen weeks of the year. This system has been created to give the opportunity to every owner to enjoy the property throughout the year.

Mainly each owner is not limited to only one period of the year, for example, for one year they may occupy the property during April, August, and December and in the next year March, July, and November. Each property is purchased fully furnished.

For golf lovers, who purchase their property in our resorts, we provide special membership conditions!

The Pestana Group is the largest multinational group of Portuguese origin in the tourism sector, being present in Europe, the Americas and Africa, with more than 100 hotels and 12,000 rooms under direct management, being elected by more than 3.5 million customers/ year.

In hospitality, its main business, the Group operates with four brands: Pestana Hotels & Resorts, Pestana Collection Hotels, Pestana Pousadas de Portugal and Pestana CR7 Lifestyle Hotels.


With the aim of offering complete and attractive products, the Group also operates in several business areas: hospitality, tourist real estate, tourism, golf, casinos and industry.

property_title: Turnkey new 4 Bedroom Villa, Algoz, Silves
property_description:
Benefiting from the quietness of village life this property is ideal for those seeking a modern and sustainable home in a prime central location.

Our rentals department have seen a large increase in holidaymakers looking for property in Cabanas de Tavira so have been able to provide rental projections as seen below. 

Located ten minutes from the historic city of Tavira, Cabanas is a hidden gem within the Algarve with many sports, activities and beach opportunities available for those willing to explore.

Tavira is one of the oldest Moorish towns in Eastern Algarve, concealing a charismatic heritage until this day, becoming one of the finest resort towns in the area.

The town extends along the river banks of Gilão, where Moorish influences beautifully compliments the deep-rooted Portuguese traditional culture. Explore the magnificent buildings and historic churches along the river through the cobbled streets, take a taxi-boat and dive into the Caribbean-Like Islands of Cabanas and Barril located just off the main town.

property_title: Turnkey new  4 Bedroom Villa, Algoz, Silves
property_description:
Benefiting from the quietness of village life this property is ideal for those seeking a modern and sustainable home in a prime central location.
Unlike traditional construction methods this property is built with the advanced Light Steel Frame system guaranteeing both durability and stability while offering optimal insulation and a construction time that is significantly reduced to 12 months.
Using high layers of insulating materials and the absence of thermal bridges the non-polluting materials greatly reduce energy consumption, making the property both modern and environmentally friendly.
The villa’s contemporary architecture beautifully integrates large sliding glass windows allowing you to live "inside-outside" while also bathing the interior in natural light, creating a warm and inviting ambiance while promoting energy efficiency and an enriched living experience.
This villa is perfect for entertaining family and friends, offering both privacy and spaciousness.
It features air conditioning in every room and solar panels for hot water, enhancing energy efficiency. Additionally, there is an option to install underfloor heating across both levels and the possibility of adding a garage or basement for further convenience.
Complete with its own swimming pool, garden and plenty of floor space this property adapts to all the needs of a couple or a family. The ground floor has a large living area incorporating a fully equipped open-plan kitchen.
Algoz, a picturesque town in the Algarve region of southern Portugal, is best known for its serene environment and traditional architecture. With a range of local shops, cafes, and markets, it provides a genuine taste of Portuguese culture while maintaining a tranquil, rural charm. Conveniently located about 40 kilometres from Faro International Airport, Algoz serves as an accessible haven for both residents and tourists exploring the beautiful Algarve.

property_title: 6 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Silves
property_description:
This six bedroom villa for sale is located in Silves, just a 10 minute walking distance from the city’s centre. Currently being completely renovated, this villa comprises of three independent properties that could be shared with family or rented out for an additional income.

The first property is a two storey townhouse and consists of an open plan living / dining room, a kitchen area, four bedrooms, three being with en-suite bathrooms, plus an extra bathroom. Sharing the same entry point, the second property is on the ground floor and consists of two bedrooms, one bathroom and an open plan kitchen and living / dining room. There’s also two patios on this floor, which can be shared, since it’s accessible from both properties.

On the first floor, the third property is a studio apartment, with a kitchenette and a bathroom. There’s also a spacious terrace facing the front of the property with countryside views. Upstairs, the large rooftop terrace offers incredible 360º views of the mountains, the city and the castle in Silves, plus it also has the structure for building a swimming pool and a BBQ.

As the villa is undergoing the final stages of the renovations, there is the opportunity for you to choose every finishing and details to design your dream home.

Additional features include:double glazed windows, fitted wardrobes and pre-installation for air-conditioning and solar panels on the terrace.

Within a two minute drive from the historic city’s centre, this property has the benefit of being located in a calm neighborhood, surrounded by nature whilst still being close to all sorts of amenities. Silves is one of the oldest towns in central Algarve, with its rich history, built on the banks of the River Arade.

Because your home will be rented when you're not using it, you should also be able to generate a healthy rental income.

More details:

- All the apartments are managed, fully furnished and equipped to 5-Star standards.

- Owners can use their apartment for up to 12 weeks (ad aeternum), with a maximum of 2 weeks in high season and a maximum three weeks in medium season and seven in the low season (winter).

- When using their apartment, owners have access to all of the Hotel’s services and facilities and have owners’ privileges and discounts.

- When owners are not using the apartment, the apartment is available to be rented to guests, ensuring a rental income for as long as they own the apartment.

These apartments are ready now, so you can view, purchase and be benefiting within a few short months.

Two bedroom apartments and three bedroom penthouses are also available - please contact us for more details.

property_description:

This apartment comprises an open plan living/dining are,  a very large terrace, 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, along with underfloor heating throughout. As to be expected from such a prestigious developer, the apartment has luxury finishes throughout from the fully equipped kitchen, which offers high quality appliances such as ceramic hob, oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, washing machine and extractor fan already installed. Residents also benefits from exclusive access to a large communal swimming pool complete with sun beds and lounge spaces, all surrounded by landscaped garden areas, sauna and gym, plus an underground private parking space.

Additional features includes: air conditioning, double glazed windows, electric shutters, excellent thermal and acoustic insulation and the water heater connected to a solar panel system.

Lagos is a town in the Western Algarve, hugely popular among people of all ages and attracting tourists from all corners of the world. It is well known for its iconic beaches and sandy coves of Dona Ana and Praia do Camilo. The cliff tops of Ponta da Piedade provide a stunning view to the sea and surrounding natural beauty. Its centre is home to many historic landmarks, including the 18th century church of St. Antonio, castle walls and the Castelo dos Governadores, one of the towns oldest features.

The modern kitchen is fully equipped with a ceramic hob, oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, washing machine, and an extractor fan—everything you need for culinary delights. The apartment includes three bedrooms, each with built-in wardrobes and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms are en-suite, providing extra privacy and convenience. There's also a full bathroom with a walk-in shower, and the entire apartment benefits from underfloor heating for maximum comfort.

Recently constructed, this immaculate property is part of a private condominium that includes two garage parking spaces, a storage room, and access to a beautiful outdoor pool. Its excellent thermal and acoustic insulation further enhances the sense of tranquility and comfort. There is also a fully equipped spa/gym and a roof top terrace with stunning sea views along with a hot tub.

Just a 10-minute walk from the city center . The apartment is also conveniently close to supermarkets, a private hospital, cafes, and restaurants.

property_title: 3+1 Bedroom Villa with Pool in Guia, Albufeira
property_description:
Located in the mature and beautifully maintained urbanization of Quinta dos Álamos, Guia  Albufeira, this stunning villa offers the perfect balance of comfort, elegance, and sustainability. Set on a generous plot of 715 m² with a total construction area of 190 m², this home is designed for relaxed Algarve living.

The villa features three spacious bedrooms, two located on the Ground  floor, and the master bedroom ensuite on the first floor,  plus an additional room with a built-in wardrobe that can serve as either an office or a fourth bedroom. The master bedroom is an ensuite and boasts generous dimensions along with a private balcony overlooking the lush gardens and sparkling swimming pool.

The property is nestled within a calm and quiet neighbourhood, surrounded by beautifully kept villas and tree-lined, landscaped streets, all maintained by the Albufeira Municipality.

Step outside, and youll find a large private pool surrounded by a manicured lawn, a jacuzzi, and an inviting outdoor BBQ and dining area. The covered terrace, complete with comfortable outdoor sofas and a dining table for six, includes retractable awnings for thermal comfort and shade, taking full advantage of the Algarves all-day sun.

For energy efficiency, the villa is equipped with solar panels for water heating, warming the pool and jacuzzi even in cooler months, significantly reducing energy consumption. Photovoltaic panels power the house, automatically switching between solar energy during the day and grid power at night, keeping costs low. The property also features double-glazed windows for excellent insulation. Although the official energy certificate is currently rated C, it does not yet reflect these later eco-friendly upgrades.

Inside, youll find a modern, generously sized independent kitchen, equipped with top-quality German appliances, with direct access to a patio. The kitchen is separated from the dining and living rooms, where a cosy fireplace awaits for cooler evenings. The home offers a total of three bathrooms.

Conveniently located just five minutes from Algarve Shopping, one of the largest malls in the Algarve offering cinemas, restaurants, a supermarket, and various amenities, the villa is also only 20 minutes from the centre of Albufeira and its famous beaches.

property_title: T1 + 1 Bedroom Apartment in Quinta Heights
property_description:
Quinta Heights is an exceptional new development offering a range of 1 to 4-bedroom residences. Its striking architecture seamlessly blends with meticulously crafted interiors, designed by the Algarve’s leading design studios. Each apartment is equipped with unique, high-quality finishes, utilizing premium materials sourced from renowned manufacturers. These residences embody some of the finest contemporary designs in the region, providing elegant living spaces that meet the highest standards of luxury.


Quinta Heights offers residents access to an impressive array of five-star amenities, including a spa, rooftop restaurant and tapas bar, gym, yoga studio, paddle and basketball courts, indoor and outdoor pools, landscaped gardens, secure underground parking, and an observatory.


The central Algarve region is home to several charming towns, starting with the picturesque village of Carvoeiro. Beautiful beach towns such as Armação de Pêra, Albufeira, and Vilamoura are also nearby. The exclusive "Golden Triangle," comprising Quinta do Lago, Vale do Lobo, and Loulé, is renowned for its sophistication and exclusivity. Faro, the capital of the Algarve, offers the region’s international airport and boasts a vibrant "old town." To the east, the market town of Olhão sits on the Ria Formosa, known for its stunning intercoastal waterways and barrier islands.


The central Algarve is rich in exceptional facilities, including championship golf courses, a world-class marina in Vilamoura, and a wide range of shopping and dining options to suit all tastes. With superb infrastructure, the region is well-equipped to welcome travelers from around the world, providing a high standard of living and luxury experiences.

property_title: 2 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Quinta do Lago
property_description:
An exceptional opportunity in prestigious Quinta do Lago, in the famous 'Golden Triangle' of the Algarve. You can own a luxury residence in a sought-after location with world-class facilities, and generate rental income when you're not using your property. 

The luxury apartments are located in Quinta do Lago, one of the most desirable locations to live in Portugal. Only 20 minutes from Faro Airport, close to the beach and boasting Michelin-starred restaurants and world-class golf, the residences are an ideal choice for an active lifestyle, including time spent playing tennis, golf, learning a new sport or exploring the fabulous Ria Formosa Natural Park.

Or maybe you prefer to relax and enjoy the leisure of shopping among world famous brand-name stores, finishing the day off with a delicious Portuguese meal at one of the many restaurants in the area.

The two bedroom apartments are designed and fitted to the highest specification, and come fully-furnished with stylish contemporary furniture. All residences have a generous balcony or terrace, full-sized kitchen and generous storage space for sporting equipment. The open plan living room and dining area create uninterrupted space. The large bedrooms benefit from an en-suite bathroom and dressing area. The second bedroom offers two single beds, so it's ideal for a small family. 

There's a large outdoor pool with sun beds, parasols and refreshing bar, and a heated indoor pool with views of the picturesque gardens.

This exclusive collection of freehold residences are available now, and will be part of a managed rental programme, tailored to suit your needs. Because your home can be fully-managed and rented when you're not using it, there's also an attractive rental return expected.

More details:

- All the apartments are managed, fully furnished and equipped to 5-Star standards.

- Owners can use their apartment for up to 12 weeks (ad aeternum), with a maximum of 2 weeks in high season and a maximum three weeks in medium season and seven in the low season (winter).

- When using their apartment, owners have access to all of the Hotel’s services and facilities and have owners’ privileges and discounts.

- When owners are not using the apartment, the apartment is available to be rented to guests, ensuring a rental income for as long as they own the apartment.

These apartments are ready now, so you can view, purchase and be benefiting from your new home within a few short months.

One bedroom apartments are also available. Please contact us for more details.

property_title: Elegant 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool, 2 Garages and Mountain Views for Sale in Paderne, Albufeira
property_description:
Elegant 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool, Garages and Mountain Views for Sale in Paderne, Albufeira
This stunning two-storey villa is located in the peaceful parish of Paderne, within the municipality of Albufeira. Set on a fully enclosed plot with gated entrance, the property offers exceptional privacy and spectacular mountain views, creating the perfect setting for a serene lifestyle in the Algarve.

On the ground floor, the villa features an open-plan design that combines a fully furnished living room with a cosy wood-burning fireplace, a stylish dining area, and a modern kitchen equipped with high-quality appliances that have seen minimal use. A breakfast counter connects the kitchen to the living space, creating a sociable and functional environment. This level also includes a laundry room and an ensuite guest bedroom, which benefits from both interior access and a private exterior entrance, offering flexibility for visitors or extended family.

An elegant staircase leads to the first floor where a bright sitting area filled with natural light opens onto the upper bedrooms. The spacious master suite boasts a dedicated sleeping area, a generous dressing room with fitted wardrobes, and a private balcony with uninterrupted views over the pool area and surrounding mountains. This floor is completed by another bedroom with a balcony facing the pool and a further bedroom that shares a well-appointed family bathroom.

The villa is designed with energy efficiency in mind, featuring solar water heating and a photovoltaic panel system that significantly reduces energy consumption thanks to the property's excellent south-facing orientation. The pool system, including motors and filtration, has been recently updated, ensuring low-maintenance enjoyment. The landscaped gardens are designed for easy upkeep and include a fully automated irrigation system and productive young olive trees. Two private garages and secure parking within the grounds add to the convenience of this exceptional home.

This beautiful property is located approximately 35 kilometres from Faro Airport, making international travel quick and easy. The stunning beaches of Albufeira, including the famous Olhos de Água, Santa Eulália, and Falésia beaches, are all within a short 10 to 12-minute drive. The villa is perfectly positioned for those seeking the tranquillity of the countryside while remaining close to vibrant coastal life. The historic village of Paderne is nearby, offering local restaurants, cultural events, and the charm of traditional Algarve living. This villa is ideal for families, retirees, or buyers looking for a private holiday retreat or investment property with outstanding potential.

property_title: 3 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Mexilhoeira Grande
property_description:
This three bedroom villa for sale is located in Mexilhoeira Grande, nestled in a quiet residential neighbourhood just a short drive from amenities. Currently under construction, completion is expected by December 2024.

Spread across two levels, the main floor will feature an inviting entrance hall that leads into an open-concept living room, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen, complete with a breakfast counter. This level will also boast a large balcony that provides views of the surroundings and the pool area, in addition to a guest bathroom and a garage for private parking.

On the lower floor, there will be three bedrooms, two of which come with en-suite bathrooms, and an additional bathroom. Each bedroom will have direct access to the outdoor space, featuring a swimming pool, a BBQ area, and landscaped gardens, perfect for outdoor enjoyment and entertaining.

Additional features include:air conditioning, double glazed windows, fireplace, electric shutters, fitted wardrobes, solar panels and pre-installation for a Jacuzzi.

Located in Mexilhoeira Grande, a village known for its peaceful ambiance and traditional Portuguese charm, this villa is only a three minute drive from the village centre, ensuring easy access to essential amenities. Moreover, the beautiful Meia Praia beach is just a 14-minute drive away, offering leisure and relaxation opportunities.

property_title: 3 Bedroom Villa in Carvoeiro
property_description:
This 5-Star resort in the Algarve is close to the beautiful villages of Carvoeiro and Ferragudo(click here for video). Two bedroom townhouses and three bedroom villas are available.

The three bedroom villa offers an elevated experience of comfort and luxury, perfect for families or groups seeking a spacious and elegant retreat. This villa boasts contemporary architecture, high-end finishes, and a well-thought-out layout designed for relaxation and convenience.

The open-plan living and dining area features chic furnishings, large windows, and tasteful décor, creating a bright and welcoming space. The kitchen is a culinary haven, equipped with premium appliances, including a built-in oven, stove top, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, and washing machine. Sleek stone counter tops, stylish cabinetry, and modern fixtures complete the kitchen's sophisticated design.

Each of the three bedrooms is a private sanctuary, featuring comfortable beds with premium linens, built-in wardrobes, and individual air conditioning for personalised comfort. Two of the bedrooms come with en-suite bathrooms, beautifully finished with high-quality tiles, spacious walk-in showers, and contemporary vanities, while the third bedroom is conveniently located near a separate bathroom with equally elegant features.

Outdoors, enjoy your private terrace or balcony, furnished for al fresco dining or lounging amidst views of the lush gardens or resort pools. Additional villa amenities include flat-screen TVs, complimentary Wi-Fi, and air conditioning throughout.

Resort Amenities

Owners and guests at the resort have access to an array of premium facilities designed to enhance your lifestyle:

• A bar and restaurant offering exquisite dining options
• A luxurious spa and fully equipped gym for relaxation and fitness
• Indoor and outdoor swimming pools for year-round enjoyment
• A kids club and playground to keep younger guests entertained
• A multi-purpose sports field and paddle court for active pursuits

Guaranteed Investment Returns

For those seeking an investment opportunity, the resort offers guaranteed annual returns of up to 5.4% until 2027(only applicable on the 2 bedroom Townhouses). This makes it a compelling choice for investors looking for a secure and profitable property in a thriving market.
Additionally, all properties are fully furnished to a high standard, ensuring a seamless experience whether you plan to use the property for personal enjoyment, rental income, or both.

property_title: 4 Bedroom Townhouse For Sale in Albufeira
property_description:
A modern four bedroom townhouse for sale in Branqueira. This property is situated within a development of 14 townhouses close to the beach resort of Albufeira. This area is extremely popular with both expats and tourists making these properties an ideal place to live or great holiday homes. 

With three bathrooms and a spacious living space with a fully-fitted kitchen, these townhouses can easily accommodate groups of friends and family. They also offer a private swimming pool which is a lovely place to relax and enjoy the wonderful Algarvian climate. 

Additional features include:air-conditionig, heating, electric shutters and double glazed windows.

Located in a quiet residential area located just five minutes from the bustling town of Albufeira. Ideally situated close enough to enjoy all of the amenities that Albufeira has to offer but far enough away to be able to be a relaxing retreat, this townhouse is perfect for holiday makers or those looking to relocate. 

Albufeira in the Central Algarve, attracts thousands of visitors every year and it's easy to understand why! There is Albufeira old town with its pretty cobbled streets lined with restaurants, bars, cafes and shops and the lively nightlife in São João, Albufeira marina with its sugar candy coloured apartments and last but not least the lovely, sandy beaches. Albufeira is perfect for families, couples and singles of all ages and is central for all the tourist attractions, with the added bonus of a short transfer from Faro airport!

property_title: 2 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Porto de Mós
property_description:
This luxury, top floor apartment is located in a private condominium on a cul-de-sac just a 5 minute walk from Porto de Mós beach. Offering amazing sea views, this apartment comprises an entry hall leading to an open concept living/dining room, a fully fitted kitchen equipped with Bosch appliances and a laundry room.

There are two bedrooms, one comes with its own en-suite bathroom and there is a second bathroom, both equipped with walk-in showers. The front terrace can be accessed through both the living room and master bedroom; it has stunning ocean views. The second bedroom also has a terrace at the back offering city views.

The condominium has a communal swimming pool, well maintained gardens, an indoor heated pool with a sauna, a gym, a communal roof terrace and an underground garage where the apartment has its own private parking space.

Additional features include: air-conditioning and underfloor heating throughout, fitted wardrobes, double glazed windows, electric shutters, electric awning, central vacuum system and elevator access.

Located within a short walking distance to the sandy beach and a wide range of amenities such as supermarkets, bars, cafes and beachfront restaurants, this apartment is the ideal investment whether you’re looking for a forever home in Portugal, a holiday getaway or even to generate extra income with holiday rental.

property_title: New modern three bedroom villa with pool in Lagos
property_description:
Discover a new, modern three-bedroom villa in Lagos, featuring a captivating backyard that guides you to the main entrance and a garage for two cars. To the right, a swimming pool adorned with glazed ceramic tiles and surrounded by a waterproof deck awaits, along with a pre-equipped space for a gas grill and a Dektone worktop sink, perfect for outdoor entertaining.
Inside, the splendid open-concept living room seamlessly integrates with the kitchen, highlighted by solid oak wood accents on the stairs. The ground floor includes a guest bathroom, garage access (which can also serve as an office), and a sophisticated kitchen with a Silestone worktop and top-quality finishes. The backyard reveals a technical area and a lush lawned garden.
Upstairs, there are three bedrooms, including a luxurious suite. The bedrooms share a well-equipped bathroom. A large terrace spans the upper floor, offering stunning views, with glass railings creating a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Enjoy abundant sunlight, thermal break aluminium frames, and mechanical ventilation for an energy-efficient home protected against moisture. The property supports hassle-free short-term rental licensing, with no condominium costs for added convenience and savings. Immerse yourself in the impeccable harmony of comfort, elegance, and functionality in this distinguished villa in Lagos.

property_title: 3 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Fuseta
property_description:
This is a unique opportunity to purchase property in a brand new residential development situated in Fuseta, East Algarve. With spectacular views of Ria Formosa the luxurious apartments have been designed to offer privacy and comfort.

This modern apartment comprises of three bedrooms, three bathrooms, open plan living/dining area, veranda and 3 covered parking spaces. This development is set within one of the most exclusive locations in the Algarve.

Fixtures and finishes will be of the highest quality on the market and mod cons will include state of the art technology and a fully fitted kitchen with premium appliances.

In addition to this, the complex provides residents with access to outdoor leisure spaces, a communal swimming pool, pedestrian access to the Ria, parking and a condominium room where you can enjoy a private garden.

Fuseta is a fishing village full of character and charm, sharing its beach with the Ria Formosa it also has a beach that is on an island that's located on the east part of the Armona Island. This is slightly after the Ria Formosa and can be accessed by small fisherman boats, making the trip to the beach a memorable and enjoyable moment.

Located within walking distance to a blue flag beach, Ria Formosa, and close to all amenities, these apartments are in the perfect location in the Algarve whether you're looking to buy an apartment to relocate to or use as a rental investment.

Faro airport is approximately 30 minutes from Fuseta making it an easily accessible place for travelers, or homeowners, from all around the world.

property_title: 2 Bedroom Apartment For Sale in Quinta do Lago
property_description:
An exceptional opportunity in prestigious Quinta do Lago. in the famous 'Golden Triangle' of the Algarve. You can own a luxury residence in a sought-after location with world-class facilities, and generate rental income when you're not using your property.

The luxury apartments are located in Quinta do Lago, one of the most desirable locations to live in Portugal. Only 20 minutes from Faro Airport, close to the beach and boasting Michelin-starred restaurants and world-class golf, the residences are an ideal choice for an active lifestyle, including time spent playing tennis, golf, learning a new sport or exploring the fabulous Ria Formosa Natural Park.

Or maybe you prefer to relax and enjoy the leisure of shopping among world famous brand-name stores, finishing the day off with a delicious Portuguese meal at one of the many restaurants in the area.

The two bedroom apartments are designed and fitted to the highest specification, and come fully-furnished with stylish contemporary furniture. All residences have a generous balcony or terrace, full-sized kitchen and generous storage space for sporting equipment. The open plan living room and dining area create uninterrupted space. The large bedrooms benefit from an en-suite bathroom and dressing area. The second bedroom offers two single beds, so it's ideal for a small family. 

There's a large outdoor pool with sun beds, parasols and refreshing bar, and a heated indoor pool with views of the picturesque gardens.

This exclusive collection of freehold residences are available now, and will be part of a managed rental programme, tailored to suit your needs. Because your home can be fully-managed and rented when you're not using it, you should also be able to generate an attractive rental return.

More details:

- All the apartments are managed, fully furnished and equipped to 5-Star standards.

- Owners can use their apartment for up to 12 weeks (ad aeternum), with a maximum of 2 weeks in high season and a maximum three weeks in medium season and seven in the low season (winter).

- When using their apartment, owners have access to all of the Hotel’s services and facilities and have owners’ privileges and discounts.

- When owners are not using the apartment, the apartment is available to be rented to guests, generating a rental income for as long as they own the apartment.

These apartments are ready now, so you can view, purchase and be benefiting from your new home within a few short months.

One bedroom apartments and three bedroom penthouses are also available. Please contact us for more details.
